Global Developmental Delay 23
Global Developmental Delay
315.8 (F88)
This diagnosis is reserved for individuals under the age of 5 years
when the clinical severity level cannot be reliably assessed during
early childhood. This category is diagnosed when an individual fails
to meet expected developmental milestones in several areas of intel-
lectual functioning, and applies to individuals who are unable to un-
dergo systematic assessments of intellectual functioning, including
children who are too young to participate in standardized testing.
